skill.name: Lunar Halo Slit
skill.description: Attack 3 times, each attacks deals <<atk*x>> Fixed Physical DMG based off of the {{x}}% of ATK.

profile.description: Until the day that evil is purged from the world, let's castigate the warlock together.
profile.affiliation: The Senior Knight of Kalian Imperial Security Task Force
profile.dislike: Someone who stares at her horns
rumors: You want to know how she was able to be knighted at such a young age? Haha, people who have crossed with her at least once will know.
Those things on her head... Aren't those horns? Having horns means she is no ordinary person, But... Huh? What? An ornament? Haha, of course it is.

lines.script: I will cut you bottom if you get in my way.
Everyone, ready yourselves for a fight.
To vanquish evil, is my duty.
This is the fate of the evil.
Death to all that is evil!
This is a dish that warms the heart.
